text: Florenville is an unincorporated community in St. Tammany Parish, Louisiana, United States. The community is located three miles west of Hickory on Louisiana Highway 36 and north of Slidell. It is on the Illinois Central Gulf railroad line.Louisiana Atlas & Gazetteer, DeLorme, 3rd ed., 2010, p. 48 ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in St. Tammany Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in New Orleans metropolitan area
title: Florenville, Louisiana
